author: Ryan Elliott
releaseNotes:
v0.7.3 - Added advanced option to change the table background color.
v0.7.2 - Set the background color to a static grey to ensure text is displaying properly.
v0.7.1 - Added options to create and update a local hub file to display the table on dashboards.

For further information or to report issues/request features, please see the community thread https://community.hubitat.com/t/release-energy-calculator-plus/108660
